title: MySQLRADIANS()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLRADIANS()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Convert a degree value into radians:
SELECT RADIANS(180);

Definition and Usage
The RADIANS() function converts a degree value into radians.
Note:
See also the
DEGREES()
and
PI()
functions.
Syntax
RADIANS(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. A number in degrees
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Convert a degree value into radians:
SELECT RADIANS(-45);

★
+1
